name: Tiny Little Slug
overview: ne day a tiny leopard slug awoke from its slumber. The grass was still moist from the morning dew, so it was a perfect opportunity too look around for food. Surrounded by this grassy area the slug was curious as to what it might find today for breakfast. It Passed by some dandelions, the slug was not interested. "Nah, not today" it thought, but a bright red fruit focused its gaze. A strawberry, covered in small droplets of water. 'Woooah' thought the slug and headed towards it at a speed that only a stone might lose to. The story for impatient players The slug is bored and is hungry for strawberries. Go get that strawberry!
